idea: REINIGEN GREEN POWER is a organisation which services unique set of renewable source of energy. This organisation is aspiring to set the manufacturing unit for creative products which can change well-being of human lifestyle. In current situation the organisation is focusing more on solar energy as it is a necessity in monetary terms and serving to set up their own decentralized solar power system which is beneficial for reduction of electricity bill and contribution towards environment.
name: Reinigen Green Power

idea:
Mahi Hearing Care Services started in the year December 2019 with a proprietorship entity.


Mahi Hearing Care Services, a startup business in Mumbai - looking forward to accelerate it to a peak of success. 


We are doing trading of hearing aid of all brands.  However, looking to build our own brand and manufacturing with due to respect under Make In India Project. 


We have an experience of 15+ years into the field and looking forward to open centers across the nation and slowly and gradually moving to internationally.


Our mission of the company:  


1) Integrity & Honesty

2) Passion for excellence

3) Safe and Clean Environment

4) Social Responsibility

5) Participative Decision Making


Vision of the company:  


To make "MHCS" a company of growth, where talent nurtures, environment is safe and every single employee will be owner of the company.
name: Mahi Hearing Care Services

idea: Om Sai Hi-tech Fire Safety Pvt Ltd in Mumbai is one of the leading businesses in the Fire Extinguisher Refilling Services. Also known for Fire Extinguisher Dealers, Fire Extinguisher Refilling Services, Rain Water Harvesting Consultants, Fire Fighting Sprinkler Manufacturers, Air Release Valve Manufacturers, Voice Coil Manufacturers, DVR Surveillance System Manufacturers, Landing Valve Manufacturers and much more.
